Blog.post: hey ppl..im in victoria now, its so damn hot!!! except for the place im staying...it's really breezy there because it is right next to the sea, and u can see surfers, and parachutists and stuff..its really cool, hehe. yea fung, ill give u guyz my number when i get one, ifi get one, but i dont think it will be that cheap..brian, what did u do to ur mail?? lemmi guess...u changed ur password and 4got it and u also forgot ur secret answer...?? hehe... oh yea, ill definitaly cling on to u guyz, and ill try to keep in touch as much as i can ok, no matter what u say! bout the girls: today, i saw this girl in the mall, and i dont know what it was about her, but i really liker her...but just from her looks...hehe *shallow moi* THERE ARE SOO MANY HOT CHICKS HERE!! but all the hot gurlz are going out with the hot guyz so...thats crap..hehe, anyway, i gtg now so ciao 4 now!!

hey ppl... just came back from johor... good to hear from you arin.... man we miss u loads... life here is never goin to be da same without u.... hey btw i think it should be damn cheap to sms us from there... if u get a hp line.... so give us ur number when u get one k =)... and yeah dont become daryl... even though i doubt u will.... daryl was a dick even bfore he left and he is still a dumbass..... and btw brian might not be using his email for a while so dont mail him... just post stuff here.... if u wanna know wat brian did... ask him.... long stupid story and make new friends dont hold on to us too much.... but dont forget us either.... and send us some pics of da gurls there.... anyway gtg sleep now... ill post summore stuff another time... ciao ppl
haha tell me everything abt ur school when u have the time ..oh btw arin once u learn japanese u can help us traslate when we go to japan on our tour ;) hehe have a good time there and take care dude

dudes....man, u dont have to worrry bout me turning into daryl... u just have to worry bout me talking like this ' ichh luhhhve maghhell' (french accent if u dont understand)... anyway, i cant wait to travel round the world,and its ok that u didnt get the wah pedal, because my dad sed not to get it anyway.. hehe, k.. im sorry my plane didn't blow up, i really wanted it to though! grrr...i can't wait to come backeither, jac....but i dont believe how much my sister cried and everyone else...anyway...ig6tg bye byeb ye bye, ciao!

hey dude its good tht u arrived in canada safely ... no prob for comin to the airport to see ya off ... haha we really wanted you to go :P hehehe jk jk .... hoped u liked our present ..hehe couldn't get you ur wow, wild , woah ( not sure) hehe padle.. we would have gotten it for u dude.. yea we are gonna make life fun for ourselves you better make you life fun too... but we are gonna travel the world!!! can't wait for tht :>.. it be cooll.. hey btw arin u better not change hehe.. don't be like daryl.... just be urself... haha we all miss you dude have fun in canada PLZ take some pics of " panas ayam ayam " for us :P and good luck with them :> cya dude

yoyo arin ma man person dude guy. y didnt 1 of ur plane engine blow up so u could come back to malaysia man? i dun friend u anymore. introduce me to every hot chick in ur skool k? and every friend u haf. and every teacher. hope u enjoy skool on the 2nd. make lots of gurl friends ya? looking forward for u coming back altho u just left yesterday. neways....keep on posting on this site and tell us abt every single thing. cya btw arin, when i wanna post u click on the POST PUBLISH button. not the POST button

Hey everyone... just arrived in canada, its not cold at all here, and i never said it would be. im soooo sad bout leaving...jac, brian, and fung, im gonna miss u clowns, and thanks for coming to the airport yesterday wif me, i really appreciate that!! the second last day was cool, had fun in bukit kiara on the second last day wif the thunder birds and friends. im gonna miss all the fun we had in kl.... but u guys keep on enjoying before u dont have the chance to anymore k? school starts on the second, i can't wait.......wait, i can wait :'( i don't wanna go to boarding!! but i've seen loaddddds of hot chicks so far...Aactually there were only like 2 really hot ones....hehe. anyway, thats all for now, ill give u guyz all a call as soon as i can ok???? bye bye! Arin

Hello everyone!! havent posted anything up in agggesss!! how has everyone been? pat... i really dont believe i talked to you yesterday although i was planning on callin you for so long...ask brian and fung.... hehe. Ppl.. bukit kiara on tuesday rite??/ u ppl gotta come... my last daY!! and im gonna take loads of photos and frame them up...one of me, jac, brian and fung, one of all the girls, one of me and mel if i can get one, one of family.... one of all of us!! hehe.... its gonna be cool mian! k, then when i meet the girl of my dreams, ill send u all a photo of her, and u r all gonna be sooo jealous, even the girls!...anyway, im going on too much, so talk later, bye bye, arin

hiya! whoa..sori i totally 4got bout 4:am....i hope u didnt stay up all nite waitin. im reallll sori!!! how was de football match? haha..ah i got to no a lot more new ppl. so dats kewl :) haha..in my homeroom...theres only 4 gurls n 14/15 guys in de class...lol. but de guys r cool..so no biggie. well..i hope fung will enjoy his stay at k.b. n yah ill miss arin too. he called me up yesterday..i was soooooo surprised!!! though, it was gd 2 hear from him..missed him a lot. i hope we cleared stuff up..cos lately everyone thinks dat im pissed wif em..when im not..n etc. haha....anyways..i miss marc too!!! :( havent heard from him at all. well i juz hope he's fine n all. how bout u yong? u alrite?! its gd 2 hear from u...COME TO OMAN!!! when r u leavin 4 miri again? will u b able 2 get a pc? get jo 2 finally get n account! okie me g2g now...it's like 6:30am here...gettin ready 4 skool :D. byeeeeee!!! mwah..tc of urself n luv ya loads, pat

yo pat its gr8 to hear tht school was THE BOOOMB:P hehehe i m awake hehehe watchin football.. life is GOOD and bad made some new friends online and got tot know ppl better how abt u??.. fung is in kota baru ..and we are all goin to hang out on tuesday vefore arin leaves :'( hope he has a good time in canada :> anyways cya online laters if ur awake :P

hey every1!! omg......1st day of skool was de BBBBOOOOOMMM!!!! :D but i think my ears r gettin deaf.....ppl yellin n screamin when they c each other...hehe. anyways, hows life ppl? yong again..ill get online at 10:00pm ur time. but than again..i can only stay 4 n hour..than i wont b on till.......4 am ur time again (i bet u wont b awake :P) okie..me g2g now..ill mail u a LOOOONG mail later k sweets. ciao! xox, pat
ok im online now

loool......talk bout b'ball!!! it kicks ass..anyways..i get online at 6:00pm my time...which is 10:00pm ur time :) okie?? kewl kewl..anyways..yah i no jac..we always talk bout confusin stuff..but at least it's interestin :P..hehe j/k!!! anyways..wats up ppl?
heyy..any1 on??

hahahah...squash???!!! hahah .. ok pat i ll meet u online then we can chat just tell me th time and date and i ll be there .. and i sent 2 e-mails to u and i already changed my password so don't worry ..and i don't arin fung and jac read ur mails .....trust me.. and chat to u next time i see ya online ciaow and btw jac atleast get a better sport !! plz :P

hmmm......squash is a really kool sport. who plays squash? y so little ppl toking. we can tok about squash. there is lots of things to tok about squash.....the rules, the ball, raquets, court. anyways.....ppl, plz try to type stuff if u do af the time. we cant depend on brian and patrina to entertain us toking about confusing stuff.
wat? who's actin weird? who's confused? huh.......ok now im confused...
get onlineeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!!!!!!

heya..yep ill reply ur mail soon...we're over derek's house now..he sez hiya to everyone. n..oi i wanna appologize if josh was bein a jerk online..he gets protective bout me. dat cud b gd n cud also b bad in sum ways..but i still love de guy..owez will. anyhoos..yah i kinda guess every1 else cud read dis..so i wont b trypin anythin personal..dat cums in ur mails..i can mail u..u juz WONT MAIL ME BACK half de time!!!!!! :( though..i was thinkin, arin n fung n em knows ur password..so how m i spose 2 no dat they dont read ma mails 2 u..n dat u dont go on my account n read my mails while they're around!!! bout de pix..np :) ill post sum up of me n de GURLS soon..cos they think all de pix i have of em r bad..so they dont lemme post em up. especially a pic of sian..de gurl i sed dat looks EXACTLY like Maggie..cept wid a browny-blondy colour hair. i get online..definately at 6:00pm my time..which will b 10:00pm ur time. so dont sleep so early! man i miss u loads! listen..bout dis whole marc situation..im gonna leave it till nxt summer..till than nm will happen. i guess dats it 4 now..ill reply ur mails soon..n bout "choo-choo train" (where de hell did u get dat nick from????) anyways..yah bout her..ill summarize it.."be a MAN" :)!! g2g now..ciao!! luv ya, pat
y are u actin so werid or maybe i m jus confused
yep?

hey pat thanks for joinin hehe.. i already replied ur mail so reply mine asap cheerrs mate :P and u need to tell me more stuff haha anyways don't write any personal stuff here coz other ppl are readin too haha just send as much mail to me as possible .. anyways tell me when u are coming online so we can chat :P ciaow pat btw thanks for the pictures

hey! well it's 12:50pm/am rite now..n i cant sleep :P im over at josh's house now..so i doubt im gonna sleep anyways...hey de pix i sent u guys of my friends here...de pc kept sendin de same pix n not de ones i added..so sori if it kept on repeatin......anyways...brian reply my mail!!!! take care!!! sweet dreams...nite! xox

good news... i changed my piano lesson to 10.30 in da mornin... so ill be finished be 11.30... which still isnt dat early... but normally i would still be asleep at dat time...hehe..... my exam... i dunt think i can change it... so im not sure if i can go to malacca... And wats happenin tommorow... at wat time?... cause wtv it is... i might also have to pick up my pasport... which should take around 30min...at least dats wat my parents say... so i can onli turn up after 12... so it kinda sucks... but then again... im also normally asleep at 12... =P oh and brian can u get ur mom to buy da stuff... cause i cant get it... okay ciao for now...

hahahah true jac .. i don't think anyone else even looks at the dam site heheheh.. ok ok ... so we are goin to do plan C ok ok .. so who else u wana ask to come???? i got some ideas.. ppl to come.::: briana , jacalina , fung anus , arina , jon chay, dawn , em , elanie, fatin, ben teo , jason , menz, verun, jia weii ... hmmm... if u want anyone else or want to cancell anyone out just post it up!! and if u wana come just post something up sayin tht u wana come okok?? bagus.. hmmm wut else ...... its night time and jac is watch 102 dalmatians... ok my plans for next week if u guys wana know.. which u prob wouldn't :P ok monday - nothing tuesday - sleepin over arins wednesday - arin's party, sleeping over thursday - melacca with jac and maybe fung friday - come back from melacca ok i need to fit jia weii in there some way coz i promised him to gosomewhere anyways ciaow if any ideas plz post :> cheers mate

yo guys .. fung and jac.. are u guys goin to sleep over in arin's house on tuesday?? if u are i have A PLAN!!!!!... ok ok .. listen up ..i mean read up!! .. ok heres plan A: first u guys come over my house and bermain bola sepak then from my house we go to arin's house by taxi. PLAN B: go to arin's house and help him move the drum set .. if he doesn't do it on monday.. hey evelyone! im damn bored, sitting here in my office... i just wanted to say thanks to the thunder birds for the really really cool, and special keychain they gave me, it really means a lot to me... hope u guyz enjoyed pirates of the carabiean, and no problemo for the flowers... now ur making me sound gay! it was from my mum! anyway, i said thanks to her many times for u guyz, and.....ya.
